claims.object: Complex network of interconnecting and overlapping food chains showing feeding relationships within a community.

surface_layer.definition: A food web is a complex network of interconnecting and overlapping food chains that shows the feeding relationships within a community.
common_uses: Shows how energy and matter are transferred

deep_layer.mechanism: Interconnected food chains showing the flow of energy and nutrients.
deep_layer.origin: Arises from complex interactions within an ecosystem.

citations: Food web | Definition, Ecosystem, Food Chain, & Examples - Britannica
